claims.quote: A single engineer manages infrastructure for 2 million users
Maintains 7% MoM growth with 99.9% uptime and lower costs

claims.claim: Reduced infrastructure costs to one-third of previous levels
claims.quote: Since consolidating on Google Cloud, our storage and processing costs are a third of what they would have been elsewhere.

claims.claim: Achieved 10x cost reduction during viral traffic spike
claims.quote: By moving everything to one large Compute Engine instance, we reduced our costs tenfold instantly.
The result is a more consistent, reliable user experience, with smoother video processing and 99.99% 'four nine' uptime as opposed to 99.9 beforehand.

claims.claim: Turns hours of video editing into minutes
claims.quote: The AI video platform Klap, powered by Google Cloud, turns hours of editing into minutes for two million creators worldwide.

claims.claim: Processes videos and delivers results within 10 minutes
claims.quote: Within 10 minutes, they receive a gallery of short, vertical videos ready to download, publish, or fine-tune in the platform's built-in editor.

claims.claim: Reduces video editing time from 9.8 hours per week
claims.quote: A study found that video specialists spend an average of 9.8 hours per week on video editing—AI can cut this down significantly.

claims.claim: Helped over 1.7 million creators generate 3.3 million clips
claims.quote: At Klap, we've helped over 1.7 million creators generate 3.3 million clips from their long-form content.

claims.claim: Short-form video will represent 90% of global internet traffic by 2025
claims.quote: Projections show that short-form video is on track to make up 90% of all global internet traffic by 2025, with ad spending in the space expected to blow past $100 billion.

claims.claim: AI video generator market growing at 20% annually to reach $2.56 billion by 2032
claims.quote: The global AI video-generator market was valued at around USD 0.7 billion in 2024 and is projected to reach USD 2.56 billion by 2032. That's a compound annual growth rate of nearly 20.0%.

claims.claim: Videos under one minute achieve 6.86% average engagement rate
claims.quote: A 2023 analysis found that videos under one minute have an average engagement rate of 6.86%, making a strong initial hook absolutely essential.
